radiographic_examinations.findings: Gallbladder is distended and contains a gallstone without evidence of wall thickening or edema. No focal liver mass. Main portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow. No ascites. No intrahepatic biliary dilation. CHD measures 4 mm. Pancreas appears within normal limits. Normal echogenicity of spleen measuring 10.2 cm. Limited views of kidneys show no hydronephrosis.
